A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was\, okay...\, the film cared too much about little jokes than it did plot. it got boring from spending all the time on either the two planets. The scene where leia uses the force doesn't make sense either. Snoke died very easily and i feel like he didn't have any story line what so ever. The only good bits were the mirror under the island and the salt planet fight.
